items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: This ToDo App showcases modern web development with Remix for efficient SSR and routing, Prisma for type-safe database management, SQLite for a lightweight database, and TailwindCSS for elegant, responsive design. It highlights robust coding practices and a clean UI.

It highlights robust coding practices and a clean UI.
